184a1(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung ngo // kha cig gis ni yongs su ma dag pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par dag yongs su bzung ngo // denas sems
184a2(mdo sde): can chen po des nga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag ste/ rab tu gnas par byas nas/ der ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin
184a3(mdo sde): po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
184a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon lam btab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang nga la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
184a5(mdo sde): lung ba ston to// de na gang gis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen skyes bu dam pa des/ snyigs ma lnga shin tu bdo zhing nyon mongs pa dang / rtsod pa'i dus la bag
184a6(mdo sde): pa'i tshe ga shin tu nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dang / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa dang
184a7(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nyam nga bar zhugs pa dag/ smon lam gyis yongs su bzung nas/ skyes bu dam pa de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan
184b1(mdo sde): da' bzhugs te/ 'tsha gang gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis cang legs so lags ma nas panya btang rje/ ting rjechen po rnam par yang byed pa bcas bya bar ming btun
184b2(mdo sde): so/ nga'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ban pa mdzad pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyid rjen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba de/ de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can du mthe bo'i rgyud
184b3(mdo sde): tsam du mi rnams kyi nang du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa khru gang tsam po nges mthe bo'i tshad tsam gyi mi de dag nyid kyi khru gsum gyi tshad tsam gyis/
184b4(mdo sde): skye dgu tshe lo bcu pa rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// des dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu ba/
184b5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag gis kyang byang chub thob pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i
184b6(mdo sde): phyir pho nya dag btang ngo // des dang po gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de/ rab tu bkod pa'i sangs
184b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byas pa bzo zhing kau rjes su dgongs pa de dag gis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa de la me tog dag bskur ro// bram ze sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
185a1(mdo sde): ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang ba dag na/ sems can tshe ring ba bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ bde bar gnas pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa rnams dang /
185a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba de de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu ngan pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid thob nas/ sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i//
185a3(mdo sde): rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i bar dag la tshe thung ngus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po lhag par mdzad cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma spangs par chos ston pa la ltos skyes bu
185a4(mdo sde): dam pa khyed kyis kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu ngan cing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongs su
185a5(mdo sde): bzung zhing / smon lam khyad par can btab pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad zil gyis mnan to// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba dang //
185a6(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i skye gnas yongs su spangs pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can
185a7(mdo sde): bsam pa dag pa shin tu dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yongs su bzung ba'i sems can de dag ni me tog lta bu zhes bya ste/ gang dag shin tu dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams
185b1(mdo sde): kyi nang du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ pad+ma dkar po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ma yin no// bram ze byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi
185b2(mdo sde): le lo'i dngos po ni bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par smon pa dang / sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa
185b3(mdo sde): dang / byang chub thob nas nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi ston par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas tshe ring bar smon pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
185b4(mdo sde): kyi le lo'i dngos po yin te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' me tog lta bu rnams zhes bya ba'i pad+ma dkar po lta bu yangs ma yin la/ sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ bram ze 'di lta ste/
185b5(mdo sde): dper na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di ma gtogs par khyab 'jug rlung gis gang gis phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can nyon
185b6(mdo sde): mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams dang / bskal pa bzang po'i rigs kyi bu kha cig kyang yongs su bzung ba lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po
185b7(mdo sde): ni ba'i po 'di dag yin teg pa'i gang zhe na / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa smon pa dang / sems can bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams la / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par ston pa
186a1(mdo sde): dang byang chub thob nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam ston par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas tshe ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi zung ba zhig par
186a2(mdo sde): mar sgrub par smon pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po yin te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems
186a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po pad+ma dkar po rnams zhes bya ba'i me tog lta bu rnams zhes mi bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems dpa' chen po rnams zhes kyang bya'o// bram ze 'di lta ste dper na/
186a4(mdo sde): khyod ni da ltar smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams kyi nang du/ dge ba lung bstan pa'i zhing du snying rje pad+ma dkar
186a5(mdo sde): po lta bur skyes pa yin no// gang gi tshe khyod kyis snying rje chen po brjod pas/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba rnams yongs su/
186a6(mdo sde): bzung zhing snyigs ma lnga bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ba'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis
186a7(mdo sde): kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ pho nya dag kyang btang nas/ khyod kyi ming snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar btags so// 'khor 'di dag thams cad kyang
186b1(mdo sde): khyod la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig 'das nas
186b2(mdo sde): lhag ma bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub cing
186b3(mdo sde): rga ba dang / 'chi ba mang ba'i sangs rgyas kyis zhing na 'jig rten ldongs pa 'dren pa med pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur cing / sems can lam ngan pas bcom pa nyam nga ba chen po
186b4(mdo sde): thong pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ lung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba nas/ dza gad sngar smos pa'i bar dag lta bus gang ba'i 'jig rten du/
186b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur te/ 'gro ba'i 'khor lo ni bzlog/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni bskor/ dbang bskur ba'i
186b6(mdo sde): bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni bcil te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu sbas khyab par byas nas/ khyod kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po dag 'byung bar 'gyur
186b7(mdo sde): ba 'di lta ste/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang lhan cig smon lam ji ltar btab pa de bzhin du lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byed
187a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe na ji ltar rgyal po chen po bdud rtsi dag pa 'di 'od dpag med ces bya bar 'gyur zhing bskal pa tshad med pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag/
187a2(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyang bskal pa chen po bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
187a3(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mang po mtha' dag byed par 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan
187a4(mdo sde): las 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos lo stong lhag par gnas par 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dam pa'i chos nub nas kyang / lus skyes pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rang gis smon/
187a5(mdo sde): lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po mtha' dag byed par 'gyur te/ sngar ji skad smos pa de bzhin du/ yun ring por sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro//
187a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de'i tshe na gnas 'gro zhes bya ba na/ bram ze zhig yod pa des 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa khyod bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na
187a7(mdo sde): bdag kyang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bar 'gyur zhing byams pa dang mthun pa'i yo byad sbyor ba dang / 'grogs par byed par gyur nas khyod la bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/ khyod
187b1(mdo sde): srid pa tha ma par gyur na/ bdag khyod kyi bar gyur cig/ skyes bu dam pa bdag khyod kyis byang chub thob pa'i sbyin bdag gi mchog tu 'gyur zhing / khyod kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par/
187b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig/ gzhan yang de na rgya mtsho'i lha mo shin tu dul ba'i blo zhes bya ba ngas kyang smras pa bskal pa zangs med pa de dang de dag ces bya ba ras
187b3(mdo sde): khyod kyis srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du gyur pa na/ bdag khyod skyed pa'i mar gyur cig/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis byang chub thob nas/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
187b4(mdo sde): chub tu lung ston par gyur cig/ rgyu skar gyi lha mo chu lha spyod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa/ de dang de dag ces bya ba nas khyod srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du gyur pa na/ bdag khyod bskur ba'i ma ma byed
187b5(mdo sde): ba'i mar gyur cig/ khyod kyi byang chub thob nas bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig/ brgya byin mu khyud can zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang ba
187b6(mdo sde): byin pha rol sems zhes bya ba de gnyis kyis kyang smras pa/ kye snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag cag kyang de dag ces bya ba nas/ khyod kyis byang chub thob pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bdag cag
187b7(mdo sde): shes rab dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa nyan thos zung du gyur cig/ gzhan yang brgya byin spyad spyod la mdzes tshogs zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa
188a1(mdo sde): bdag cag kyang khyod de dang de dag ces bya ba nas/ srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du gyur pa'i bur gyur cig/ gzhan yang ri'i rtse'i lha mo des pa king shu ka zhes bya ba des kyang
188a2(mdo sde): smras pa ka snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag kyang tshe rabs de dang de dag tu khyod kyi btsun mor gyur cig/ khyod kyis byang chub thob nas bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
188a3(mdo sde): tu lung ston par gyur cig/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po mdzes spyod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod bskal grangs med pa de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na
188a4(mdo sde): bdag kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la byams pa dang mthun pa'i yo byad kyis grogs byed pa'i bran nyid du gyur te/ khyod la bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/ khyod srid pa tha ma par gyur pa la yang bdag
188a5(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis byang chub thob nas kyang chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs par gyur cig/ khyod kyis chos bstan pa/
188a6(mdo sde): bdag gis dang por 'bras bu dang bcas par byed par gyur cig/ chos kyi bcud kyang 'thung bar gyur cig/ 'chi ba med pa yang rtogs par gyur cig/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir/
188a7(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar yang thob par gyur cig/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ de na lha dang klu dang / lha ma yin gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis kyang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug
188b1(mdo sde): byung gron lam btab ste/ 'dul ba dag kyang nyer bar bkod do// de nas 'thob pa mi 'gyur 'jigs byed ces bya ba gcig cig 'dug pa des smras pa/ sde zam ze chen po bdu/
188b2(mdo sde): kyang khyod la yo byad mang ba dag gis thogs byang bar gyur cig/ bdag bsal pa dpag tu med pa dag tu khyang la 'bras bu dang bcas pa spyod cing nye bar 'chi ba'i bangar gyur ste// rtag tung nga sa
188b3(mdo sde): bslang ba'i ngan du khyod kyi drung du nye bar 'gro bar gyur cig/ mal cha dang / kun dang / bgo ba dang / glang po che dang rta dang shing rta dang / grong dang gagrong khyer dang / zong brdal dang / khyim
188b4(mdo sde): dang bu dang / bu mo dang / sha dang khrag dang pags pa dang / rus pa dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / lce dang / rna ba dang sna dang mig dang / mgo dag spong bar gyur cig/ bram ze che
188b5(mdo sde): po bdag de ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi grogs su yang gyur cig/ bram ze chen po bdag de ltar khyim byang chub
188b6(mdo sde): kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur cig/ nam khyod kyis byang chub thob pa na/ bdag kyang khyod kyis nyan thos kyi gnas thob par gyur cig/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri 'dzin
188b7(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/ rjes su chos ston par gyur cig/ khyed kyi bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu bram ze snying rje chen po dang ldan pas de
189a1(mdo sde): zos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas nas 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur 'jigs byed bos te smras pa skyes bu dam
189a2(mdo sde): pa khyod nga'i bla na med pa'i spyod pa'i grogs su 'gyur ba na legs so legs so// khyod tshe rabs khrag khrig 'bum phrag tshad med pa'i bar du nga la dngos po slong ba'i phyir nam 'ongs pa de'i tshe/
189a3(mdo sde): ngas kyang sems rab tu dang bas sbyin par bya ste/ khyod la bsod nams ma yin pa'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen
189a4(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa des de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying rjechen po'i spyan sngar gsol pa btsun pa bcon ldan 'das pa dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu ma mchis grangs
189a5(mdo sde): ma mchis pa de dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bdag gi mdun slongs mo pa gang dag mchis nas/ zas slong bar bgyid cing
189a6(mdo sde): tshig 'jam po 'am/ tshig rtsu po 'am/ brnyas pa'i tshig gam/ tshig gsal bas slongs par gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis slong mo pa la sems kyis skad cig
189a7(mdo sde): tsam zhig khro ba bskyed par gyur tam/ ma dad pa'i sems bskyed par gyur tam/ sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas/ sbyin pa stsol bar gyur na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
189b1(mdo sde): khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gis bslus par gyur cig bdag/
189b2(mdo sde): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis slongs mo pa la sems ma dang bas sbyin
189b3(mdo sde): pa stsol tam/ sbyin pa de yang len pa po la dad pas/ byin par gyur zhing chud za bar 'gyur ram/ gal te tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam zhig dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyid par gyur na/
189b4(mdo sde): bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig/ gal te skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam zhig len pa po'i dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyid par gyur na// bdag
189b5(mdo sde): kyang mnar med par 'chi bar gyur cig/ zas la ji lta ba de bzhin du slongs mo pa gang dag bdag la gos dang / mgo'i bar dag slong bar 'gyur zhing / tshig 'jam po 'am/ tshig rtsub/
189b6(mdo sde): po 'am/ brnyas tshig gam/ tshig gsal bas mgo'i bar dag slong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis slongs mo pa la sems kyis skad cig gcig tsam zhig khro
189b7(mdo sde): ba'i sems bskyed par gyur tam/ ma dad pa'i sems bskyed par gyur tam/ sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas mgo bo'i bar dag yongs su gtong bar gyur na/ bdag gis
190a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur pa nas/ bdag mnar med par 'chi ba'i bar du gyur cig/ sbyin pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du tshul khrims//
190a2(mdo sde): nas shes rab dag yongs su gtong ba la yang brjod par bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des/ byang chub sems dpa'
190a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i sems kyis smon lam de lta bu btab pa ni// skyes
190a4(mdo sde): bu dam pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang thal mo sbyar te 'khor
190a5(mdo sde): nas/ de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i yid kyis smon lam de lta bu btab pa ni/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so khyod ni snying
190a6(mdo sde): rje chen por 'gyur ba dang / mthun pa'i chos drug gis sems can rnams yang dag par tshim par byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ji ltar sbyin pa len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba pa mi/
190a7(mdo sde): 'gyur 'jig byed des smon lam btab pa de bzhin du/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kyang smon lam btab bo// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang /
190b1(mdo sde): dang bdas / de sar 'dab pa'i 'gyur 'jigs byed kyi sman lam btab pa de babar du/ srog chags brgyang chu bani spong gis pang sngon lam dal bu dag btab pa zos pa dang / denas snying cher pa dang /
190b2(mdo sde): ldar pa de mchog tu dga' ba dang / yod bde ba skyes nas thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bltas te/ mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis sbas pa/ a la la bdag chos
190b3(mdo sde): kyis mu ge dang / zad pa'i dus dang / nyon mongs pa chen pos dkrugs shing rtsod pa'i dus na/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten mgon dnga'i did dpon dang / sdang ba byed pa dang / zon ma
190b4(mdo sde): byed pa dang / byis pa skyabs med pa/ ldongs pa rnams kyi lam ston par 'gyur ba dang / 'di ltar bdag gis sems dang po bskyes pas/ tshe rabs gzhan dag tu gang dag bdag gis mgo
190b5(mdo sde): len par 'gyur ba dang / mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / pags pa dang rus pa dang khrag dang / kha zas kyi bar dag len par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi spyod
190b6(mdo sde): pa'i grogs byed pa de lta bu dag rnyed pa ni ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos
190b7(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'dug ste/ gsol ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs gzhan gyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa de dang de dag nas/ byang chub kyi
191a1(mdo sde): mthar thug pa'i bar du bdag gis drung du slongs po pa gang dag nye bar 'chi bar 'gyur zhing yun ring po de srid kyi bar du zas sam/ skom dag blangs par gyur pa dang / bdag
191a2(mdo sde): gi sug pa nas tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam gyi sbyin pa blangs par gyur pa'i sems can de dag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gal te 'khor/
191a3(mdo sde): ba las yongs su thar par mi bgyid dam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen pos lung ston par mi bgyid na/ bdag gis gang dag da ltar phyogs
191a4(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par 'gyur ba nas/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
191a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba'i bar du gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
191a6(mdo sde): chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis ji ltar sngon de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po rtse 'dzin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od
191a7(mdo sde): zer gyi spyan sngar dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i smon lam 'di lta bu btab ste// skyes bu dam pa des smon lam ji ltar btab pa de bzhin du bskal pa chen po
191b1(mdo sde): tung zung ga zum med las na tu las pa skyed du/ byang chub sems dpa' spong ba spyad nas/ 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba zag 'thub 'das pa na 'angs
191b2(mdo sde): na gyi khams 'od zer so sor rtogs pa zhes bya bar/ skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa'i nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin
191b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang dag mtho zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du gyur cig/
191b4(mdo sde): lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs so// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ma
191b5(mdo sde): tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang dag mtho yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ de'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ni lo stong du gnas par gyur to// dam pa'i chos nub nas dam pa'i chos
191b6(mdo sde): kyi gzugs brnyan yang lo sdong du gnas par gyur to// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang dag mtho yongs su mya ngan las
191b7(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul dang / dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gnas pa na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma gang dag tshul khrims 'chal pa/ sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa mi mthun pa
192a1(mdo sde): spyod pa/ 'jig rten gyi nor 'phrog pa dang / ngo tsha med pa rnams dang / chos kyi mchod pa gcod par byed pa/ ngo tsha med pa dang 'dres pa rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge
192a2(mdo sde): 'dun dang / mngon du gyur pa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi gos dang / zas dang mal cha dang stan dang / nad kyi gsos sman dang / yo byad gcod cing gang zag gir yongs su gzung ste/ bdag spyod/
192a3(mdo sde): par byed pa 'am/ khyim pa la sbyin par byed pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang dag mtho des/ theg pa
192a4(mdo sde): gsum po dag gis rim gyis lung bstan to// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang su dag bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la ngur smrig dmar po bgos pa thams cad kyang theg pa gsum po dang /
192a5(mdo sde): gis phyir mi ldog par lung bstan to// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gangs su dag snga ma kho na bzhin du lhung ba'i rtsa ba byung bar gyur pa de dag
192a6(mdo sde): kyang ston par 'du shes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa yod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa des theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par de bzhin du/ skyes
192a7(mdo sde): bu dam pa khyod kyis kyang / byang chub kyi spyod pa'i smon lam btab pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des de bzhin
192b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam ni 'di lta bu lags te/ ji srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
192b2(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod pa nas/ byang chub kyi mthar thug pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i bar du/ bdag gis sem can gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gre rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la sbyor bar gyur pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du stsol
192b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / rab tu 'god par 'gyur ba 'am/ tha na dge ba'i rtsa ba skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam la sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag las/ sems can 'ga' tsam zhig
192b4(mdo sde): dag gis theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod par ma gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dag na
192b5(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
192b6(mdo sde): 'chang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bla na med pa'i ye shes thob nas kyang / sems can gang dag bdag gis bstan pa la/ chos gos ngur smrig
192b7(mdo sde): bgos par gyur pa las ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung bar gyur pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa can gyi lta ba zhugs par gyur pa 'am/ dkon mchog gsum la 'khrul par gyur par gyur cing
193a1(mdo sde): nongs pa dang bcas par gyur pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma gang dag skad cig gcig tsam bdag la ston pa'i 'du shes sam/
193a2(mdo sde): gus pa'i sems bskyed par gyur pa'i sems can de dag las btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis za na sems can 'ga' tsam zhig spangs shing / theg pa gsum po dag gis
193a3(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par ma gyur na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par 'gyur ba nas/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
193a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba'i bar du gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub thob pa'i chos gos ngur smrig dmar po lha dang mi rnams kyis gus par bgyis pa dang /
193a5(mdo sde): bla mar bgyis pa dang / ri mor bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ba mthong ma thag tu ngur smrig mgul na thogs par 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis
193a6(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag bza' ba dang / btung ba dang bral zhing bkres pa dang / slob pas gnod par gyur pa rnams dang / tha na gnod sbyin dbul po rnams sam
193a7(mdo sde): gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sem ca gang dag za na chos gos ngur smrig sor bzhi tsam 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bza' ba dang btung ba phur sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing / bsam pa/
193b1(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ lba'am gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am thu 'am ka lha ma yin nam// nam mkha' lding dam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ so 'phye chen po 'am gaphrul bum dang kA
193b2(mdo sde): 'am mi 'am/ sems can gang dag phan tshun zhes 'gras zhing khon btsugs mang por gyur pa rnams dang / phan tshun 'gyed cing g.yul ngor zhugs te g.yul spong bar gyur pa rnams kyis kyang //
193b3(mdo sde): bdag gis chos go ngur smrig rjes su dran par gyur na/ sems can de dag snying rje'i sems dang 'jam pa'i sems dang khon med pa'i sems dang / las su rung ba'i sems su gyur cig
193b4(mdo sde): sems can gang dag g.yul ngo 'am/ 'gyed pa 'am/ 'thab pa 'am/ rtsod pa'i nang du bsrung ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba dang / gus par bgyi ba'i slad du ngur smrig gi dum bu 'char bar
193b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag kyang rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khrul pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba ma mchis par gyur cig/ g.yul de dang 'gyed pa dang / 'thab mor/
193b6(mdo sde): rtsod pa de dag las kyang legs par yongs su thar par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi chos gos ngur smrig dmar po 'phags pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag dang ldan
193b7(mdo sde): par ma gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams smras par gyur pa nas/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzog par bgyid par rngo mi
194a1(mdo sde): thog pa dang / bdag gis chos rnams bskyud par gyur pa dang / bdag gis gzhan mu steg can rnams tshar gcod par rngo mi thog pa'i bar du gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom/
194a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang dag bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar dude bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu brjod cing phyag 'tshal
194a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang las kyi sgrib pa bas par gyur zhing / mthar yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bla na med pas yongs su mya las 'das par 'gyur ba lags
194a4(mdo sde): so// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ phyag gi mthil gyis byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgo la
194a5(mdo sde): byugs nas bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi smon lam ni dge ba bzang ba/ rab tu gtan la dbab pa yin te/ legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod ni de bzhin du 'phags pa'i yon
194a6(mdo sde): tan lnga dang ldan pa'i ngur smrig dmar pos sems can rnams nye bar 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro// kye rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de/ de bzhin
194a7(mdo sde): gshegs pas bsod nams kyi phyag sor ring pos yongs su bkab cing / phyag g.yas pa 'jam zhing gzhon pa'i mthil gyis byugs pa dang / lung bstan cing legs so zhe bya ba byin pa des mchog
194b1(mdo sde): tu dga' zhing rab tu dang ba bskyes nas rtsom nyi sa lon pa lta bu'i tshad tsam du gzhon nur red do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang dri ba dang / mi dang /
194b2(mdo sde): lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur cing / me tog dang rol mo'i sgra dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
194b3(mdo sde): snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la mchod pa byas te/ bsngags pa dang tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs kyis bskyod nas zal mo sbyar te 'khod do// theg pa chen po'i mdo snying rje pad+ma dkar po la
194b4(mdo sde): lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o// / bam po bcu gsum pa/ rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po
194b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa des yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin
194b6(mdo sde): bo che'i snying po la gus pa dang bcas pas yongs su zhus pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang / tshogs rnam par
194b7(mdo sde): dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan lagras/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang / tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs
195a1(mdo sde): bstan pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang / tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags
195a2(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo tshogs ji lta bu dang ldan na brtan par gnas pa lags/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa ji lta bus ni brgyan pa lags/ rigs
195a3(mdo sde): kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la 'di skad ces
195a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyi zhu ba bzang / spobs pa dge sde snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod de lhar de bzhin gshegs pa don de lta bu yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni/ snying rje
195a5(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa khyod sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams la phan pa byed pa dang / gces spras byed pa rgya chen po skyes pa yin te/ legs so legs so// snying rje chen po dang ldan
195a6(mdo sde): de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin
195a7(mdo sde): dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de la gnas pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rjes su zhugs pa yin no// rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod/
195b1(mdo sde): de ra des ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad phyag rgyas 'debs par byed do// seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ de la gnas nas ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis rnam par rtse bar byed do//
195b2(mdo sde): zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed do// zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan
195b3(mdo sde): 'dzin par byed do// chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad khong du chud par byed do// phyag rgya rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge
195b4(mdo sde): 'dzin thams cad kyi spyi gtsug rnam par byed do// chos kyi dbyings su rnam par song ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par nges par 'gro bar
195b5(mdo sde): byed do// nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin par byed do// rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi phyed par byed do//
195b6(mdo sde): chos la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la phyag rgyas 'debs par byed do// ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po shin tu brtan pa'i ting badzin gyis ni 'i dra nang rgyal po nyid du rab tu
195b7(mdo sde): gnas par byed do// 'od zer 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'od zer 'gyed par byed do// stobs kyi brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la stob/
196a1(mdo sde): dang brtson 'grus su byed do// yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad las gyen du 'phags par byed do// nges pa'i tshig ston pa'i/
196a2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshig la 'jug pa la 'jug par byed do// tshig bla dgas la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ming gi rjes su
196a3(mdo sde): 'jug par byed do// phyogs la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par lta bar byed do// chos thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni//
196a4(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi rab tu dbye ba rjes su rtogs par byed do// phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'dzin par byed do// chos thams cad
196a5(mdo sde): la dben pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad las dben pa'i chos nyid la rjes su 'jug par byed do// brjed pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi
196a6(mdo sde): rjed par byed do// chos thams cad las mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mi g.yo ba nyid du gnas par byed do// chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i//
196a7(mdo sde): phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad sdud cing yang dag par 'du bar byed do// chos thams cad la rlom sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'byung /
196b1(mdo sde): ba dang 'jug pa'i rlom sems med par byed do// nam mkha' khyab par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la nam mkha' ltar khyab par byed do// chos thams cad rgyun mi
196b2(mdo sde): gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyun mi gcod par byed do// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'dzin par byed do//
196b3(mdo sde): chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi btsur 'dzin par byed do// rig chen rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ yo byad kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar
196b4(mdo sde): byed do// chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par ston par byed do// rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting
196b5(mdo sde): nge 'dzin thams cad lham me/ lhan ne lhang nger byed do// chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par 'byed par byed do// tshol ba med pa'i ting nge
196b6(mdo sde): 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi chos rnams nam yang tshol bar mi byed do// gnas la rten pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gnas pa'i chos nam yang yang dag par
196b7(mdo sde): rjes su mi mthong bar byed do// nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid lta bur snying po med pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// sems
197a1(mdo sde): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams spong bar byed do// gzugs mu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ gzugs/
197a2(mdo sde): kun tu snang bar byed do// dri ma med pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sgron ma bzhin du byed do// chos thams cad mu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad
197a3(mdo sde): la ye shes mu med par ston par byed do// glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la shes pa mu med pa ston par byed do// 'od thams cad byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'od byed pa'i sgo/
197a4(mdo sde): nye bar ston par byed do// khams kyi mtha'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin mtha' med pa thams cad rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir nye bar ston par byed do// ting nge 'dzin dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
197a5(mdo sde): niting nge 'dzin gyi chos rnams la stong pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do// lhun po ltar bkra ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad gsog nyid du ku tu ston par byed do// 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
197a6(mdo sde): gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dri ma sel bar byed do// chos thams cad kyi brda'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad madres pa nyid du yang dag par ston par byed do// dga' ba byed pa'i/
197a7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dga' ba rab tu thob par byed do// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la ngo bo nyid mi
197b1(mdo sde): dmigs pa ston par byed do// thog 'gyur ba thong 'dzin gyis na/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mi zad pa nyid ston par byed do// chos thams cad la rnam par g.yeng ba med cing rdul dang bral ba'i/
197b2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi shes pa rdul dang bral ba nye bar ston par byed do// mi zad pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting de thams cad zad pa med pa dang / zad pa med pa
197b3(mdo sde): ma yin pa yang dag par ston par byed do// chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab cing rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad mig yor lta bur ston par byed do// gzi brjid yod pa ni
197b4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyis ni gting nge 'dzin thams cad la ye shes 'bar bar byed do// zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad pa med pa dang / nyams pa med par ston par byed do/
197b5(mdo sde): mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la g.yo bar mi byed/ 'gul bar mi byed/ 'phro bar mi byed do// rnam par 'phel ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin dang / snyom sa
197b6(mdo sde): par 'jug pa thams cad la shes bya rnam par 'phel bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nI/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'od zer gyi sgo dag 'gyed
197b7(mdo sde): par byed do// zla ba dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snang bar byed do// snang ba dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la so so yang dag par
198a1(mdo sde): rig pa bzhi rab tu thob par byed do// bya ba dang ma bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ bya ba dang mi bya ba'i bya ba byed cing ye shes tog kyang yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do//
198a2(mdo sde): rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad nges par 'byed par byed cing / gang la 'byed pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do// sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ sems//
198a3(mdo sde): g.yo bar mi byed/ 'gul bar mi byed/ snang bar mi byed cing gnod par 'gyur ba yang med la/ de 'di snyam du 'di ni sems yin no// snyam du yang mi sems par byed do// kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin//
198a4(mdo sde): gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snang ba yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu gnas pa nyid kyis rab tu gnas par
198a5(mdo sde): byed do// rin chen brtsegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rin po che'i brtsegs pa lta bur kun tu snang bar byed do// chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge/
198a6(mdo sde): 'dzin thams cad la phyag rgya 'debs par byed cing / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ mnyam pa nyid la ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do//
198a7(mdo sde): dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la dga' ba spong bar byed do// chos kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la yi ge mi mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par byed
198b1(mdo sde): do / yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la yi ge gcig kyang mi dmigs par byed do// dmigs pa bcom pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la dmigs pa rnam par
198b2(mdo sde): gcod par byed do// 'gyur ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la 'gyur ba mi dmigs par byed do// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la ban
198b3(mdo sde): 'dogs pa mi dmigs par byed do// gnas med par rgyu ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la gnas mi dmigs par byed do// rab rib dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin
198b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi spyod pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / mun pa'i yul las yang dag par 'da' bar byed do// yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad
198b5(mdo sde): la bsags pa spyod par byed do// sems med par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la sems zhes bya ba mi dmigs par byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin
198b6(mdo sde): gyis ni/ chos thams cad rtogs par byed do// dran pa rnam par 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la spobs pa grangs med pa thob par byed do// de byed pa'i shes pa rnam par
198b7(mdo sde): dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par byed do// ye shes tog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ khams gsum thams cad las yang dag par/
199a1(mdo sde): 'da' bar byed do// shes pa nye bar gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad rnam par gcod pa yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// ye shes rnam par
199a2(mdo sde): 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad kyi rnam par 'phro ba nyid rjes su thob par byed do// gnas med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad gnas su gyur pa med pa nyid du
199a3(mdo sde): yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos 'ga' yang gnyis su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do// rnam par bsgrub pa dang
199a4(mdo sde): ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad kyi rnam par bsgrub pa yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// srid pa'i gzhi thams cad rnam par sel ba thams cad du gtogs pa'i ting
199a5(mdo sde): nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la nges par 'byed pa'i ye shes 'jug cing / gang la 'jug pa 'ga' yang mi rnyed par byed do// brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ sgra dang brda
199a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyis rjes su 'jug par byed do// sgra dbyangs kyi ye shes dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad yi ge dang bral bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// ye shes
199a7(mdo sde): kyi sgron ma dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gzi brjid kyis lham me lhan ne lhang der byed do// ye shes mchog gi mtshan nyid rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/
199b1(mdo sde): chos thams cad la yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid ston par byed do// mngon par shes pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la mngon par rig pa med pa yang dag
199b2(mdo sde): par rjes su mthong bar byed do// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par byed do// jug
199b3(mdo sde): bsngal thams cad shin tu spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la gnas pa med pa yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// byed rgyu mi zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad
199b4(mdo sde): la zad pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do// gzungs kyi gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos thams cad 'dzin cing yang dag pa nyid dang / log pa nyid yang
199b5(mdo sde): dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do// 'gag pa dang 'gal ba rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad dang mthun pa dang 'gal bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do// 'od
199b6(mdo sde): dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni// ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'dus byas kyi dri ma dang bral ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar byed do// snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos
199b7(mdo sde): thams cad la snying po med pa mi dmigs par byed do// zla ba nyab dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la yon tan yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bkod pa chen po'i to
200a1(mdo sde): nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bkod pa chen po dang ldan par byed do// snang ba thams cad rab tu 'byed ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la
200a2(mdo sde): ye shes kyis snang bar byed do// ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid rnam par snang bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rtse gcig pa nyid rab tu thob par byed do// na mong pa med pa dang / nyon mongs
200a3(mdo sde): pa dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par byed do// rlung gi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams
200a4(mdo sde): cad la gnas mi byed do// de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las mi ldog par byed do// lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel
200a5(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la 'jig tshogs mi dmigs par byed do// ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ byang chub sems
200a6(mdo sde): drapa'i chos thams cad la ngag gi las mi dmigs par byed do// nam mkha' ltar chags pa med la rnam par 'grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
200a7(mdo sde): ni chos thams cad la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa nyid rjes su thob par 'gyur te/ de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
200b1(mdo sde): po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo sdud pa'i chos kyis rnam grangs gang zhe na/ byang/
200b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i tshogs ni sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni smon lam yongs su
200b3(mdo sde): rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i tshogs ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnam
200b4(mdo sde): kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni/ dgos pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs ni/ cang shes kyi sems su byed
200b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi tshogs ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su shes par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i
200b6(mdo sde): tshogs ni spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni sems cad thams cad nye bar 'chor bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
200b7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs ni shes pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni sems las su rung bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
201a1(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong gi tshogs ni/ the tsom dang bral bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa'i tshogs ni/ zhe 'gras pa'i sems
201a2(mdo sde): med par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i tshogs ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la skyo ba med par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
201a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshogs kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms kyi tshogs ni/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong
201a4(mdo sde): bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos mnyan pa'i tshogs ni/ sgrib pa spong bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'i tshogs ni
201a5(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad spong bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgon par gnas pa'i tshogs ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las byas pa chud mi zad par byed par 'gyur ro//
201a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i tshogs ni/ gzungs thob par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi tshogs ni/ blo rab tu 'byed par byed par 'gyur ro// byang
201a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i tshogs ni/ don gyi rnam pa rjes su rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshogs nilus dang tshor ba
201b1(mdo sde): dang / sems dang chos rjes su rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i spong ba'i tshogs ni/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams/
201b2(mdo sde): cad snyoms par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i tshogs ni/ lus dang sems yang ba nyid du byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang
201b3(mdo sde): po'i tshogs ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshogs ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par byed
201b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs ni/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid rjes su rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam gyi tshogs ni/
201b5(mdo sde): lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i tshogs ni/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams spong zhing mtho ris su skye ba thob par byed par
201b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshogs ni/ sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ston pa'i
201b7(mdo sde): tshogs ni/ shes pa gzhan la rag ma las par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshogs ni/ yon tan thams cad kyi sgo yin par 'gyur ro// khyang
202a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshogs ni/ 'jig can thams cad la mi slu bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba'i tshogs ni tshogs thams/
202a2(mdo sde): cad mthar phyin par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa'i tshogs ni khyad par du 'gro bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang du yang dag pa
202a3(mdo sde): 'jog pa'i tshogs ni/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po'i tshogs ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed par/
202a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshogs ni/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
202a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa la mkhas pa'i tshogs ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i
202a6(mdo sde): tshogs ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de re byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i ma yang dag par sdud pa'i chos kyi
202a7(mdo sde): rnam grangs yid do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ri mo cha'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen pa la rnam par gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
202b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa pas te bka' stsal pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs pa'i rgyan zin bus d+hanan/ bathod /
202b2(mdo sde): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ don dam pa mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'bad pa don yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems dang / khams gsum pa las
202b3(mdo sde): cad dang / sems can thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni/ dge sbyong gi chos mi 'jigs pa chen po zhes bya ste/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang gi sems
202b4(mdo sde): chos thams cad la nam mkha' dang lag par mnyam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa'i rgyan yin na// ji ltar na bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba na/ 'di lta ste
202b5(mdo sde): byams pa dang / bdag med pa dang / snying rje dang / sems can med pa nyid dang / dga' ba dang / yid byung ba dang / btang snyoms dang / gang zag med pa nyid dang / sbyin pa dang / dul
202b6(mdo sde): ba sapas nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / zhi ba'i sems nyid dang / bzod pa dang / bzod pa'i sems nyid dang / brtson 'grus dang / dben pa'i sems nyid dang / bsam gtan dang /
202b7(mdo sde): nges pa sams pa'i sems nyid dang / shes rab dang / rgyam pa'i sems nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bsag pa dang / dran pa med pa dang / yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid dang /
203a1(mdo sde): dag pa'i spong ba dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i sems dpa'i sems nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i
203a2(mdo sde): sems nyid dang / dad pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / dran pa dang / rang 'byung gi sems nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug par byed pa'i sem
203a3(mdo sde): nyid dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / dbang po med pa'i sems nyid dang / stobs dang / mi rdzi ba'i sems nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / blo rab tu 'byed pa'i sem
203a4(mdo sde): nyid dang / lam dang sgoms pa'i sems nyid dang / zhi gnas dang / nye bar zhi ba'i sems nyid dang / lhag mthong dang / rmongs pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / 'phags pa'i bden/
203a5(mdo sde): pa bsgom pa dang / shin tu yongs su shes pa'i sgom pa'i sems nyid dang / sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dang / mun pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / chos yid la byed pa dang / chos
203a6(mdo sde): kyi dbyings mnyam pa'i sems nyid dang / dge 'dun yid la byed pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdod ma nas rnam par dag/
203a7(mdo sde): pa'i sems nyid dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i sems nyid dang / zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / nam mkhwa dang mnyam pa'i sems
203b1(mdo sde): cid dang / mtshan yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mtshan med pa'i sems nyid dang / bzod pa thob pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang
203b2(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang / khams gsum gyi snying po len pa'i sems nyid dang / sems can thams cad la bdud tshar gcad pa'i sems
203b3(mdo sde): nyid dang / sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub dang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i sems nyid dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang
203b4(mdo sde): chos thams cad bskor ba med pa'i sems nyid dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa dang / 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gyis sems nyid kyi chos de la gang rjes su rtogs par
203b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba 'am/ rab tu rtogs par bya ba phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs shing / rnam par smin pa med pa'i chos la mos par byed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ gang dag phyogs
203b6(mdo sde): bcu nas sngon gyi tshul gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang / tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar bya rgod kyi
203b7(mdo sde): phung po'i ril lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa ya phrag drug dang / bzhi 'bum po de dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thog pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bka'
204a1(mdo sde): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po sa / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ byang
204a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyis/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gling
204a3(mdo sde): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyis ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis ni/ ting nge
204a4(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang / tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs shing / rnam par dag pa'i ye shes khong du chud par gyur to// rigs kyi bu/
204a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de yang mchog tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dang ba des gzhon nu lo nyi shu lon pa lta bur red nas de bzhin gshegs
204a6(mdo sde): pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs ring du 'brang bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu rgyal po bdud rtsi dag pa de yang bu stong dang / khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri dang gzhan yang srog chags bye ba phrag
204a7(mdo sde): dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang lhan cig 'grogs te/ mngon par byung zhing rab tu byung nas/ tshul khrims dang thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa dag gis mngon par brtson par byas par
204b1(mdo sde): gyur to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zad nas/ mthar gyis nyan thos kyi/
204b2(mdo sde): theg pa'i gtam gyi chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong blangs shing kun chub par byas so// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam gyi chos kyi phung po dgu khri lung mnos shing grags te
204b3(mdo sde): kun chub pa'i bar du byas so// de bzhin du bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i gtam la yang lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam 'bum lung mnos shing klags te kun chub par byas so//
204b4(mdo sde): tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam 'bum dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam 'bum dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam 'bum yang lung mnos shing klags te
204b5(mdo sde): kun chub par byas so// khams kyi tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang / skye mched kyi tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang / 'dod chags kyi kun tu sbyor ba spang ba'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang /
204b6(mdo sde): zhe sdang gi kun tu sbyor ba spang ba'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang / gti mug gi kun tu sbyor ba spong ba rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam
204b7(mdo sde): par thar pa'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i tshogs kyi gtam 'bum yang lung mnos shing klags te kun chub par byas so//
205a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i thad nas/ chos kyi phung po 'bum phrag bcu'i bar dag kyang gzung zhing klags te kun chub par byas so// rigs kyi bu ji tsam
205a2(mdo sde): kyi dus gzhan zhig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya
205a3(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des rol mo'i sgra dang / me tog dang / phye ma dang me tog phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / gdugs
205a4(mdo sde): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag gis mchod pa byas shing / spos chu sna tshogs kyis bkrus nas/ sku gdung
205a5(mdo sde): gzhag pa'i mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas la/ 'phang du dpag tshad lnga brgyar ni dpag tshad byed yod pa yang brtsigs/ de nas zhags bdun gyi bar du rol mo'i sgra dang / me
205a6(mdo sde): tog dang / me tog phreng dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rin po che dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ der yang
205a7(mdo sde): sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag zag pa gsum yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do// de zhag bdun po de dag 'das pa dang / srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong
205b1(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu mngon par zung ste/ skra dang 'a spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig dag zagos te/ yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin pa/
205b2(mdo sde): che'i snying po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa 'bar bar byas te/ la khri'i bar du dam pa'i chos 'dzin par gyur nas/ der yang sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag theg pa
205b3(mdo sde): gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzin bcug cing bcud de rab tu bkod do// gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la yang rab tu bkod do// dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang / dge tshul gyi sdom pa dang / bsnyen
205b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po tshangs par spyod pa'i sdom pa la yang btsud de rab tu bkod do// des yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dgu mngon par shes pa dang
205b5(mdo sde): 'phrul la mkhas pa la nges par sbyar cing nges pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas la yang nges par sbyar/ phung po rnams dgra lta bur gyur par yongs su shes pa la yang nges par sbyar/
205b6(mdo sde): skye mched rnams grang stong pa lta bur yongs su shes pa la yang nges par sbyar/ chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhes 'dus byas shes pa mthong ba yongs su shes pa la yang nges
205b7(mdo sde): ber sbyar/ chos thams cad mig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / chu zla lta bur yang bstan skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang / mtsham sbyor ba med pa'i 'gog pa dang / zhi ba dang
206a1(mdo sde): rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / mchog dang gya nom pa'i 'gog pa mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su shes pa yang bstan te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
206a2(mdo sde): pa la rab tu bkod nas / 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur te/ sems can de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dge sbyong chen po de'i rus pa
206a3(mdo sde): la snga ma bzhin du mchod pa byas te/ ji ltar 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rus pa dag la mchod pa byed pa de bzhin du de'i tshe na/ sems can de dag gis kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa dge sbyong
206a4(mdo sde): chen po de'i rus pa dag la mchod pa byas so// gang gis nyin mo snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong chen po 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa de'i nyin mo de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying
206a5(mdo sde): po'i dam pa'i chos kyang rub ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni smon lam gyi dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu skye ba yongs su bzung ste
206a6(mdo sde): kha cig ni smon lam gyi dbang gis dga' ldan gyis gnas su skyes so// kha cig ni mi rnams kyi nang du/ kha cini klu rnams kyi nang du/ kha cig ni lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du/ kha cig ni
206a7(mdo sde): smon lam gyi dbang gis dud 'gro'i skye gnas su sna tshogs dag tu skyes so// rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong chen po 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang / smon lam gyi
206b1(mdo sde): bang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho brags logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag 'dren ces bu ba yod de/ den mi rnams pargya lo brgyad du
206b2(mdo sde): thub pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ gtum pa/ lag pa khrag gis gos pa/ sdig pa la zhen pa/ sems can thams cad la brtse ba med par zhugs pa mar mi 'dzin pa/ kha
206b3(mdo sde): pa/ 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba sha sag ste/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong chen po de smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'dren der gdol ba'i rigs su skyes
206b4(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ de yang lus shin tu ring bar gyur cing / shin tu skabs dang ldan pa/ shin tu shugs dang ldan pa/ shin tu dran pa dang ldan pa/ shin tu spobs pa dang ldan pa/ shin tu mgyogs
206b5(mdo sde): pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ des stobs kyi shugs brtan pas/ sems can dag bzung ste smras pa/ kye sems can dag khyed cag gal te srog gcod pa spong ba dang / ma byin par
206b6(mdo sde): pa spong ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa pa dang / log par lta ba'i bar dag spong bar byed na/ ngas khyed cag gi srog sbyin par bya zhing 'tsho ba'i yo byad dag kyang sbyin par bya'o// kye
206b7(mdo sde): gal ta me spong na ngas srog dang bral te 'gro'o/ de nas sems can de dag gis bal mo sbar te smras pa / mgon po khyod kyi tshig gis bdag cag dang sman chad nas ji srid 'tshe
207a1(mdo sde): ba ba'i bang duthog bcang pa dang / mabyed par lar panas log pa sa pa'i bdadag spong bar bcar // gangs bsom pan sang nas rgyal pa dang rgyal pos bababs pa dgal
207a2(mdo sde): bsgo ba/ kho bo'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad du zas dang skom dang bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba dang / gos dang mal cha dang / spos dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang nor bu dang / mu tig dang / tsun
207a3(mdo sde): dang dung dang / man shel dang byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dag dgos kyis/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad mang po dag kho bo la phul cig/ gdol pa stobs can des ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du sems
207a4(mdo sde): can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / de nas mi de dag kyang tshe lo lnga brgya thub par gyur to// de nas rgyal po gang yin pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa dang / de nas
207a5(mdo sde): rgyal po'i blon po de dag gis gdol pa stobs can de rgyal po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/ rgyal por bcug nas rgyal po bsod nams spobs zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal/
207a6(mdo sde): po bsod nabs stobs kyis/ ring po ma lon par yul der rjes su bstan te/ brtson 'grus bcan zhing rdul bas yul gnyis par yang rjes su brtan nas/ rgal po bsod nams spobs
207a7(mdo sde): ring po ma lon par 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bar du gyur to// gang gi tshe rgyal ba bsod nams stobs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyal srid bzung
207b1(mdo sde): ngas ro'i bag tu sems can rnams srog gcong pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de rab tu bkod do// de ba'i mdu mabyon par len pa dang / log par lta ba'i bar dag spong ba
207b2(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud te/ yang dag pa'i lta ba'i bar dag la rab tu bkod do// sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzin
207b3(mdo sde): du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod do// de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la rab tu bkod cing theg pa
207b4(mdo sde): gsum po dag la nges par sbyar nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du sgra dbyangs rjes su bsgrags pa slongs mo pa gang su dag zas 'dod pa dang / rin po che'i bar dag 'dod pa de dag
207b5(mdo sde): thams cad tshur sheg shig dang / ngas thams cad la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o zhes bsgrags so// de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams
207b6(mdo sde): cad lhags nas/ rgyal po bsod nams stobs la slong mo byed par gyur pa dang / rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis kyang de dag las brtsams te/ sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag byin
207b7(mdo sde): no/ de nas 'tshe ba pa rdul dbyangs zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyi drung du song ste smras pa/ rgyal po chen po gal te khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
208a1(mdo sde): bzhed cing / sbyin pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su gtong ba dag yongs su gtong bar mdzad la/ rgyal po chen po ga te khyod kyis bdag gi bsam pa yongs
208a2(mdo sde): su rdzogs par mdzad par gyur na ni/ rgyal po chen po khyod rgyal ba 'jigs rten gyi sgron mar 'gyur lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod ci zhig 'dod/ 'tshob pa rdul dbyangs kyis
208a3(mdo sde): smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni lha ma yin gyi g.yul chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags chang nyid 'tshal na/ cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pa'i slad du/ mi gson po'i lpags pa yang 'tshal
208a4(mdo sde): mig kyang 'tshal te/ de'i slad du bdag khyod kyi spyan sngar mchis nas gsol ba bgyid lags so// rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis
208a5(mdo sde): stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid thob nas sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag cig dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod cing theg pa gsum po la yang nges par sbyar te/ bdag gis
208a6(mdo sde): sbyin pa yang dpag tu med pa zhig byin na/ 'di ni snying po med pa'i lus las snying po len par byed pa zhig ste/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no snyam nas/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ngas
208a7(mdo sde): khyod la sha'i mig tha mal pa 'di sbyin par byas/ dga' bar gyis shig/ des na bdag gis bla na med pa'i chos kyi spyan thob par gyur cig/ ngas khyod la rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis rang
208b1(mdo sde): ga pags pa 'di yang sbyin pa byas/ des na bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu 'i nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyi lag pa
208b2(mdo sde): g.yas pas rang gi mig gnyis byung ste/ 'tsho ba pa la byin nas gdong khrag gis yog bzhin du smras pa// 'di na gang dag 'dir lpags pa dang nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang sa la gnas
208b3(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams dang // gnod sbyin mthu chen po rnams dang / mi 'am ci gang yin pa rnams dang sgyu ma yin gang yin pa rnams dang / 'byung po gang yin pa rnams dang / mi gang yin/
208b4(mdo sde): pa rnams bdag la nyon cig/ bdag gis sbyin pa byang chub tu bsngos pa'i dge bas zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par gyur nas/ bdag gis sems cad rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi bzad pa
208b5(mdo sde): las grol zhing bla na med pa'i zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god par gyur cig/ yang smras pa gal te bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur bar ldan/
208b6(mdo sde): ji srid du 'tsho ba pa 'di'i rig sngags de grub par ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bdag gi dbang po 'gag par ma gyur cig/ bdag gi dran pa yang nyams par ma gyur cig/ bdag 'gyed par yang
208b7(mdo sde): ma gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu rgyal pos pags pa yang khyer cig ces sbas pa dang / 'tsho ba pa rtul dbyangs des mtshon rnon po blangs te/ rgyal po bson po'i lus las lpags pa shus nas/
209a1(mdo sde): lpags pa khyer te rig sngags bsgrubs so// de ltar zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyi srog gi dbang po yangs ma 'gags/ dran pa yang ma
209a2(mdo sde): nyams sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de yang mi myong / de la skad cig tsam yang 'gyod pa skyes par ma gyur to// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na snying rje chen po dang ldan
209a3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ gzhan du mi lta ste/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i yab snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba
209a4(mdo sde): der gyur to// ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyes par gyur pa'i dang po ni de yin no// ngas dang po sems skyed pas/ sems can 'grang ba las 'das
209a5(mdo sde): pa dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste/ nga'i dpa' bo'i dngos po dang / dpa' bo'i bya ba dang po ni de yin no// da smon lam gyi dbang gis
209a6(mdo sde): de nas shi 'phos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'dren du gdol pa'i rigs su skyes pa de'i tshe na/ ngas gdol pa'i rigs su gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba la sbyar cing /
209a7(mdo sde): rang gi stobs dang rtul bas stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid thob pa'i bar dang / 'dzam bu gling thams cad 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa'i rnyog pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byas shing tshe yang bsrings te ngas dang
209b1(mdo sde): zo lus yongs su btang ba de ni/ nga'i dpa' bo'i dngos po dang / dpa' bo'i bya ba gnyis pa yin no// gang gi tshengs rang gi mig dag yongs su btang zhing rang gi lpags pa yang yongs su btang ste/
209b2(mdo sde): de nas shi 'phos pa na yang smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag par 'dren de nyid kyi gling gnyis par gdol pa'i rigs su skyes nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ der yang ngas brtson 'grus ba
209b3(mdo sde): shing rtul ba de la bus sems can rnams dge ba'i las ngag la nges par sbyar nas/ stobs kyi 'khor lo sbyar ba'i bar yang tho ba'o// der yang 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa'i rnyog pa dang / 'khon par/
209b4(mdo sde): 'gyed pa dag rab tu zhi bar byas te tshe yang bsrings so// der yang rang gi lus las lce dang / rna ba dag yongs su btang ba na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag 'dren gyi snong chen po de kun gyi gling
209b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bar du yang skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas so// smon lam dang brtson 'grus brtan zhing rtul ba rjes su 'brel ba dang / smon lam gyi dbang gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i
209b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yang / sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la nges par sbyar cing // theg pa gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzin bcug ste/ 'thab pa dang
209b7(mdo sde): rtsod pa pa'i rnyogs pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'khon pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byas shing / skyes bu chen po'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas
210a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ni 'di'i phyir te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag
210a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ gzhan gyi ltung ba gleng bar mi byed cing / gzhan yang 'jigs pa ston par mi byed la/ sems can rnams nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas/
210a3(mdo sde): kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du ma bcug pas na/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gyur te/
210a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ltung ba'i ming yang med la/ bslab pa bzung ba yang med/ tshig rtsub po yang mi grag/ mi dge ba'i sgra yang mi grag ste/ gzhan du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de chos
210a5(mdo sde): kyi sgra dang / yid du mi 'ong ba med pa'i sgras khyab pa yin no// de na sems can rnams kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed pa yin te/ de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming du
210a6(mdo sde): gdags pa tsam yang mi srid do// ngas ni gang gi tshe bsal pa chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dag tu tshig rtsub
210a7(mdo sde): po dang / 'jigs su rung bas sems can rnams srog gcod pa spong ba yangs dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa nas/ theg pa gsum po dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du
210b1(mdo sde): bcug cing bcud de rab tu bkod pas na/ de'i las kyi 'phros da ltar rang nyon mongs pa dang ldan zhing / mi dge ba'i sgras kun tu khyab la mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis
210b2(mdo sde): mongs su gang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lta bu/ theg pa gsum po ches ston te/ ngas ni sngon ji ltar smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung zhing / ngas 'dus
210b3(mdo sde): baba'i sems can ji lta bu dag yongs su bzung ba de lta bu kho na'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pas byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod de/ smon lam ji lta bu btab cing / sa bon ci
210b4(mdo sde): 'dra ba btab pa de 'dra'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'thob bo// / bam po bcu bzhi pa/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i
210b5(mdo sde): smad pa spyod pa na/ sbyin pa yongs gtor ba yongs btang ba yang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' gang gis kyang de lta bu'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su ma btang la/ ji ltar ngas byang
210b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' spyod pa spyod pa na/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su btang ba ltar/ phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
210b7(mdo sde): pa spyod pa na/ de lta bu'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su gtong bar mi 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdor sdus te khyod la bshad par bya'o// skyes bu dam pa brgyad ni mi
211a1(mdo sde): gtogs te/ skyes bu dam pa sas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa ni/ lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams kun dbyangs zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs/
211a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dres spong 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur nas/ skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya pa rnams la chos ston cing zhag bdun na yongs
211a3(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus yang dag skul zhes bya ba de ni/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams mi pham can zhes bya bar
211a4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya pa rnams la bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las lhag pa snyed du sangs rgyas kyi
211a5(mdo sde): mdzad pa mdzad nas/ de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa de bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ da dung yang thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa de'i sku
211a6(mdo sde): gdung rnams snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag na/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' snying po me tog rgyas zhes bya ba ni/ brtson
211a7(mdo sde): 'grus dang yi dam brtan pa dang / yongs su gtong ba'i stobs kyi shugs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sprad pa spyod de/ de bskal pa chen po gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa'i 'og
211b1(mdo sde): du 'di nas brang phyogs su snyigs pa lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'ang dur bcas yang dag 'dzin ces bya ba zhig 'thung bar 'gyur ba dang / skyes bu ngas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzom
211b2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyur bcas nag po rnam par 'jom pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
211b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 'od zer kun 'khrugs 'dzin ces bya ba'i skyes bu dam pa de ni bskal pa chen po gcig 'das nas/
211b4(mdo sde): nub phyogs su snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs ldan zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ba der/ skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya pa'i nang du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
211b5(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i snying po 'od zer dri ma med pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba/
211b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// legs dag 'di yang bskal pa bzang ba las yang dag par 'das pa snyed rdzogs pa'i 'og tu/ steng gi phyogs logs su bskal pa
211b7(mdo sde): chen po rtsod rnyog mi bzad yang dag 'khrugs ces bya ba la snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'gyur byed mi gtsang bsags zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ legs dga' 'di
212a1(mdo sde): sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'gyur byed mi gtsang bsags zhes bya ba der skye dgu'i tshe lo lnga bcu pa rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa
212a2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi/
212a3(mdo sde): bar du 'gyur zhing de sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis lo bcus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ de nyid kyi nub mo de bzhin gshes/
212a4(mdo sde): pa de'i dam pa'i chos kyang nub par 'gyur zhing / lo bcu'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de stongs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' rab tu lag brkyang 'di sngor gyis smon
212a5(mdo sde): lam gyi dbang gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'gyur byed mi gtsang bsags der skye dgu'i tshe lo sum cu rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs/
