379b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi don tu bdag gis gzungs kyi gsang sngags
379b5(mdo sde): kyi gzhi rnams rab tu stsal bar bgyi yis// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsung gcig gis byang chub sems dpa'i lag na rdo rje la leg
379b6(mdo sde): so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// lag na rdo rje khyod la dgongs zin gyis mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la phan pa 'dod pa dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ gzungs kyi gas bkra/
379b7(mdo sde): kyi gzhi 'di dag smos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po dag la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'dzin/
380a1(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// tad+ya thA oM badz+re badz+re/ ma hA badz+re badz+re dA sha d+ha ri ni/ sa ma sa ma sa man ta/ a pra ti ha ta badz+re/ sham sha ma/ pra sha man tu sarba bya d+ha ya/ kur ku ru/ sarba karA nI/ sa ma ya ma nu sar d+ha ka/
380a2(mdo sde): ban badz+ra pA Ni/ sarba A sham me/ pa ri pU ra ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi mtshan dang / sngon gyi sngon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /
380a3(mdo sde): klog pa de'i re ba thams cad bdag gis yongs su bskang bar bgyi'o// don thams cad kyang bsgrub par 'gyi'o// gal te ras bdag mthong bar 'tshal na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'drir stsal bar gyi/ de bzhin
380a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'di dag gi sku gzugs bdun kyang bgyi// rdo rje 'dzin kyang sku gdung dang bcas par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la yang ji skad gong du smos pa bzhin du spos dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / phreng ba dang /
380a5(mdo sde): rgyan dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil sran dang / pheg rdob pa rnams kyis mchod de bskor bar bgyi/ gzugs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang gdon par bgyi/ sems can thams cad la yang phan pa'i sems dang /
380a6(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems su bgyi// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i srin gnas la gnas te/ lan gsum khrus bgyi zhing gos lan gsum brje bar gyi chos brgyad nas brtsams te/ zla ba phyi ma'i lda
380a7(mdo sde): bar du nyin gcig bzhin du rig sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ de la bdag gis mi lam du mthong bstsal bar bgyi// 'phel ba'i bka' mchid kyang bgyi/ re ba thams cad kyang yongs su bkang bar dgyi'o/ zhenas bya /
380b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i 'khor de thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la legs so// zhes bya ba'i byin te/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis gzungs kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag legs par spras pa legasas/
380b2(mdo sde): legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje nged kyis sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i phyir/ gzungs kyi
380b3(mdo sde): gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnamal bos te bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag myed la/
380b4(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su gtad kyis/ khyed kyis ci nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshungs pa/ sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/ ba thams cad yongs su songs pa 'di kyi
380b5(mdo sde): ma'i tshe phyi ma'i 'dus lnga brgya tha ma/ sems can bsod nams chung ngu dam pa'i chos smod pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams kyi lag tu myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar srungs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan
380b6(mdo sde): pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das/
380b7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi
381a1(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ byung
381a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes dang bcas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spong zhing re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig
381a3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis kyis dam bcas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
381a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za
381a5(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten mi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngor gyi sngor lam gyi rgyang
381a6(mdo sde): par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo brgyad brgya pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shi len dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi
381a7(mdo sde): lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar cad kyis kyang bcos te gtan la phab pa/ bya ba'i rgyud du gtogs so//
